title: Video: Sea Oleena – Sister
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/seaoleena.jpg "seaoleena")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7435-video-sea-oleena-sister/attachment/seaoleena)

After releasing her [Sleeplessness EP](http://seaoleena.bandcamp.com/album/sleeplessness) late last month, [Sea Oleena](http://seaoleena.bandcamp.com/album/sleeplessness) has been gaining a decent amount of attention and it’s not hard to hear why. Her approach to pop is daring, fragile and utterly delicate, with each moan and exclaim reaching out to the listener with an angelic malevolence. Her first video is a perfect representation of her sound; it’s simple, elegant and eerie in all the right places. Check it out bellow.
